Title: For Him the Bell Tolls
Plot: With Xena away on a mission, Gabrielle must contend with Aphrodite, who's interfering in one of Cupid's lovespells that will unite two kingdoms and who's put a spell on Joxer, who behaves like a real hero whenver a bell rings.
GuestStars: Karl Urban, Mandie Gillette, Craig Parker, Rachale Davies, Ross Jolly
